text: etiya yihetu tomaloke sihamtara paraa arau sihamte yiborara ibadata karae se'iborara paraa bicchinna haicha, seye etiya tomaloke guhata asraya grahana karaa. Tomalokara pratipalake tomalokara babe te'omra rahamata bistara karaiba arau tomalokara babe tomalokara jiranopakaranara bisayato sahaja karai diba
